segments.text: Observing this domestic moment, the woman's dress and apron catch my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such care, towel bunched up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is a catastrophe in progress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Endless water flows out, no drain in sight to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows, threatening to make everything slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness frustrates me to no end.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, to her left, the upper cabinet doors swing open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the cookie jar tempts the young boy on his stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans back, on the verge of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate, perhaps to steady or collect cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, partnering in the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the calm garden mocks the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for the children's safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
